dmca.title: Google DMCA - FileMaker
dmca.body:
VIA FACSIMILE

Attn: Google AdWords, DMCA Complaints
Google Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Unauthorized Use of FileMaker Property

Dear Sir or Madam:

FileMaker, Inc. and its affiliated companies (collectively, "FileMaker") are the exclusive owners of copyrights in the FileMaker family of software products and the related FileMaker Certification exams.

It has come to our attention that Google Inc. is hosting advertisements for TestKing, and TestKing is engaged in unauthorized copying and distribution of FileMaker's property. We believe that the Internet access of the user engaging in this infringement is provided through links in advertisements on Google's site.

Copyrighted Work:

TestKing is infringing the confidential FileMaker 8 Certification Exam owned by FileMaker. TestKing is offering the same copyrighted work on its site at: http://www.testking.com/certification-training-FileMaker.htm, under the name "FileMaker 8 Developer Essentials"

Search Query: Filemaker certification

Infringing Sponsored Link:

Filemaker Certification
First Time Pass . 100% Guaranteed.
FileMaker Answers. Purchase Now !
TestKing.com

Infringing Web Pages:

www.testking.com/certification-training-FileMaker.htm
http://www.testking.com/FMO-302.htm

TestKing Contact:	email: support@testking.com

This unauthorized copying and distribution by TestKing constitutes copyright infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act. Depending upon the type of service Google is providing to this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not expeditiously remove or disable access to the FileMaker property, or if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of subscribers who are repeat infringers (see, 17 U.S. C.
